subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! President Vetoes Iraq Timetable Bill
body:
President Bush has vetoed legislation to pull U.S. troops out of Iraq, in a 
historic showdown with Congress over whether the unpopular and costly war 
should end or escalate.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
